Package cli

Class CLIParametersInferSequences

java.lang.Object
cli.CLIParametersInferSequences
All Implemented Interfaces:
CLIParameters
public final class CLIParametersInferSequences
extends java.lang.Object
implements CLIParameters
Parses command line interface arguments for the `MUSIAL inferSequences` module.

Used to parse and validate passed command line options or print help information to the user. Parsed arguments are stored to be accessible for other components of the tool.

Since:
2.1
Version:
2.1
Author:
Simon Hackl

  • Field Details

    • ARGUMENTS

      public java.lang.String[] ARGUMENTS
      The unprocessed command line content passed by the user.

    • GS

      public boolean GS
      Whether to output genotype sequences.

    • GSMSA

      public boolean GSMSA
      Whether to output genotype sequences as multiple sequence alignment.

    • PS

      public boolean PS
      Whether to output proteoform sequences.

      If `true`, proteoforms with any sample specified in samples will be considered.

    • PSMSA

      public boolean PSMSA
      Whether to output proteoform sequences as multiple sequence alignment.

      If `true`, proteoforms with any sample specified in samples will be considered.

    • samples

      public final java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> samples
      ArrayList of Strings yielding information about for which samples sequences shall be extracted.

      If empty, sequences for all samples will be extracted.

    • features

      public final java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> features
      ArrayList of Strings yielding information about for which features sequences shall be extracted.

      If empty, sequences for all features will be extracted.

    • outputDirectory

      public java.io.File outputDirectory
      File object specifying the output directory.

    • inputVDict

      public VariantsDictionary inputVDict
      VariantsDictionary to infer sequences from.

  • Constructor Details

    • CLIParametersInferSequences

      public CLIParametersInferSequences​(java.lang.String[] args) throws MusialIOException
      Constructor of the CLIParametersInferSequences class.

      Used to parse and validate command line interface input. Parsed arguments are stored - and accessible by other components - via class properties.

      Parameters:
      args - String Array containing the command line arguments.
      Throws:
      MusialIOException - If any error occurs during input file validation.
